alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Lee; Phillips (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued May 15 at 5:50PM CDT until May 15 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 222 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN EAST ARKANSAS CRITTENDEN LEE PHILLIPS IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 11 COUNTIES IN NORTH MISSISSIPPI BENTON COAHOMA DESOTO LAFAYETTE MARSHALL PANOLA QUITMAN TALLAHATCHIE TATE TUNICA YALOBUSHA IN TENNESSEE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 13 COUNTIES IN WEST TENNESSEE CROCKETT DYER FAYETTE GIBSON HARDEMAN HAYWOOD LAKE LAUDERDALE MADISON OBION SHELBY TIPTON WEAKLEY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALAMO, ASHLAND, BARTLETT, BATESVILLE, BOLIVAR, BROWNSVILLE, CHARLESTON, CLARKSDALE, COFFEEVILLE, COLLIERVILLE, COVINGTON, DRESDEN, DYERSBURG, GERMANTOWN, HELENA, HOLLY SPRINGS, HUMBOLDT, JACKSON, MARIANNA, MARKS, MARTIN, MEMPHIS, MILAN, MILLINGTON, OAKLAND, OLIVE BRANCH, OXFORD, RIPLEY TN, SENATOBIA, SOMERVILLE, SOUTHAVEN, TIPTONVILLE, TUNICA, UNION CITY, WATER VALLEY, WEST HELENA, AND WEST MEMPHIS.
